players.name: Alice
memory: You: " I am innocent and saw Diana with Bob last night. "
Charlie: "I am innocent and was with Alice last night. Bob was not with Diana, so he's likely the Mafioso."
Bob: "I am the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will investigate further to confirm this."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
